name: Verify the REST response for a GET request returns all the mandatory fields
id: com/testing/stories/consult_dictionary/MyHotelService_Validation.story;Verify the REST response for a GET request returns all the mandatory fields

testSteps.description: Verify the REST response for a GET request returns all the mandatory fields #1: {baseURI=http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api, BASE_PATH=/webapi/hotels, ENDPOINT=/getAll, REQUEST_TYPE=GET}

children.description: Given I have a Base URI {http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api} for the REST API
When I send the {GET} request to RestAPI
Then all the mandatory fields should be returned in the response

title: Verify the REST response for a GET request returns all the mandatory fields

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I have a Base URI <baseURI> for the REST API
And its base path is <BASE_PATH>
And its endpoint is <ENDPOINT>
When I send the <REQUEST_TYPE> request to RestAPI
Then all the mandatory fields should be returned in the response
